definitions.definition: A person who is professionally employed to add writing to something (as a sign, shop window, etc.)
A particular profession in the production of comics , an artist specializing in neatly writing written material such as dialogue.
A device for printing letters of text.

main_definition: A person who is professionally employed to add writing to something (as a sign, shop window, etc.)
secondary_definitions: A particular profession in the production of comics , an artist specializing in neatly writing written material such as dialogue.
A device for printing letters of text.
